name: Playtest: This Cursed Machine
description: This Cursed Machine is a sci-fi body horror fulfilment center simulator. Reverse engineer complex recipes and use your own body as a large-scale production circuit. Build strange machines and connect them into supply chains to fullfil orders like five-hour-energy, sludge, and e-liquid.

speakers.name: Moving Castles
speakers.bio: Moving Castles is a game studio and design lab for Autonomous Worlds.
